item.description:
August's event will be a SUNDAY Meetup.

This month's topic: The Writing ABC: Apply Butt to Chair

For the rest of the year, we will discuss the writing basics. We kick off our series on most basic topic of all. Nothing's gonna happen unless you apply butt to chair. We will discuss:

Writing every day
Making time to write
Procrastination

Agenda:

4:00 Names. When do you write?
Topic: The Writing ABC

Follow-up Challenge: Morning Pages
September Exercise (TBD)

5:00 Break
Book / Magazine Offerings
Open Discussions
July Follow-up: Writing out a page
August Exercise: Special Ability pro/con

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Science Fiction Writers August Meetup
